thread.title: Report: Female Special-Ops Marines Cannot Meet Some Standards | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: Report: Female Special-Ops Marines Cannot Meet Some Standards | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Report: Female Special-Ops Marines Cannot Meet Some Standards | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
During Johnny Carson’s 1975 interview with Ronald Reagan, the latter referred to a federal study unearthed by a congressman entitled The Demography of Happiness. Some $249,000 was spent to discover that people who make more money are happier than people who make less, young people are happier than old people, and people who are healthy are happier than people who are sick. That’s spending a lot of money to unearth the obvious. Similarly, Fox News is reporting that “female Marines cannot meet some standards for special operations forces,” according to a report prepared by a brigadier general for the USMC commandant.
